data.title: Rebecca "Becky" Sanchez
data.meta_description: Rebecca 'Becky' Sanchez went to be with her Lord & Savior on March 11, 2023 surrounded by her loved ones. Becky was born to Frutoso Quintana & Eufemia Sandoval on December 16, 1935 in Pecos N.M..
data.text:
Rebecca 'Becky' Sanchez went to be with her Lord & Savior on March 11, 2023 surrounded by her loved ones.

Becky was born to Frutoso Quintana & Eufemia Sandoval on December 16, 1935 in Pecos N.M.. She was a homemaker and enjoyed babysitting and helping raise her grandchildren. She was known by Nana to her grandchildren and their friends.

Becky is survived by her children: Son: Raymond Sanchez from Espanola N.M.; and daughters: Julie Sanchez & husband Walter from Dixon N.M., and Frances Montoya & husband Edward from Grants N.M.; Grandchildren: Herman Pe単a Jr., Richard Pe単a, Louella Montoya, Edward Montoya Jr. & Brenda Candelaria; 16 great-grandchildren; and four great great-grandchildren; Sister: Thelma Aguilar from Silver City, NM; & Brother: Ruben Sandoval from Grants N.M.; Sistersin-law: Mae Larra単aga of Santa Fe, N.M. and Katie Lujan of Penasco N.M.; Godchildren: George Garcia III, James Lujan, Chris Sanchez & Diana Gonzales.

She was preceded in death by her parents: Frutoso Quintana & Eufemia Sandoval; husband: William Sanchez; Children: Louella, Ronnie, & Baby Angel Sanchez; Granddaughter: Becky Ann Pe単a; Brothers: David Quintana, Louie Armijo & Rudy Sandoval; Sisters: Cora Gonzalez, Susie Roybal, Ramona Sapien; Gloria Zubiate.

Her celebration of life will be held on March 25, 2023 at 12 pm. at the Grants Potters House located at 342 First St. in Grants, NM. Pastor Larry Teshima officiating. Compassion Mortuary has been entrusted with her arrangements.
